name: battleship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a very large military ship with big guns: A plane sunk the battleship at sea. Three submarines attacked the mighty battleship.
Paul Souders/The Image Bank Unreleased/GettyImages
[ U ] (usually battleships); (also Battleship, Battleships) a game for two people in which they each try to guess the position of marks the other person has placed on a grid (= an arrangement of squares) representing ships and battleships: One day it rained and we spent all day playing battleships. Cries of "D-9!" and "You got me!" can be heard as people play Battleship.
More examplesFewer examplesHis dream of serving on a battleship was crushed by poor eyesight.The admiral ordered his fleet of battleships to alter course.Napoleon's thirty-three battleships faced twenty-seven British vessels.
